events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident that occurred yesterday evening involving a collision at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized as an Auto Accident as the reported incident involves the insured vehicle.
An agent was assigned promptly to handle the claim and provide assistance with the next steps.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer of quick processing.
Request sent to the customer to provide photos of the vehicle damage and a police report for verification.
The customer submitted all requested documents, including the police report and photos of the damaged car.
Investigation began to assess the collision details, causes, and extent of the damages to the vehicle.
The investigation team completed their review and confirmed the claim’s validity and damage assessment.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on the damage evaluation and policy coverage.
The customer responded positively, agreeing with the settlement amount and expressed satisfaction with services.
The claim was formally approved, authorizing the release of funds for vehicle repairs.
The payment for the approved claim amount has been issued and transferred to the customer’s bank account.
The claim has been successfully closed following payment and confirmation from the customer.
The claim documentation and records were archived for future reference as per company policy.
